bioghist.head: Historical Note
bioghist.p: Thomas Read Rootes Cobb (1823-1862) was a Georgia statesman and Confederate general, from Cherry Hill (Jefferson Co.), Ga.

scopecontent.head: Collection Overview
scopecontent.p: Civil War papers and routine political correspondence, including pay vouchers for enlisted men and officers in Cobb's Georgia Legion, two letters regarding the death of Edward F. Bagley, 1861, and a letter to his wife from Fredericksburg, Va., discussing the war.
